sentences.english: Singapore is also deploying an urban search and rescue team.
sentences.chinese: 新加波也派遣了城市搜救隊。

sentences.english: China's maritime rescue teams will continue to help search and rescue Vietnamese victims and survivors.
sentences.chinese: 中國海上搜救部門將繼續幫助搜救越南遇險漁民。

sentences.english: China's maritime rescue teams will continue to help search and rescue Vietnamese victims and survivors.
sentences.chinese: 中國海上搜救部門將繼續幫助搜救越南遇險漁民。

sentences.english: The team also includes 20 paramedics and specialists in building structures.
sentences.chinese: 搜救隊還包括20名醫護人員以及土木結構專家。

sentences.english: A 15-member Chinese search-and-rescue team arrived in Japan on Sunday.
sentences.chinese: 一支15人的中國搜救隊在星期天抵達日本。

sentences.english: Finally, there is Disaster City itself, the urban search-and-rescue training ground.
sentences.chinese: “災難城”爲搜救訓練場的核心場館。

sentences.english: Canine Search Specialist conducts canine search operations and redundant verifications of alerts.
sentences.chinese: 執行搜救犬搜索並對發現的倖存者進一步確認。

sentences.english: At present the search and rescue operation is still ongoing.
sentences.chinese: 目前搜救行動還在進行當中。

sentences.english: To undertake day-to-day work of the Joint Inter-ministerial Meeting of the State Council for Marine Salvages ;
sentences.chinese: 承擔國務院海上搜救部際聯席會議的日常工作。

sentences.english: Associated Press, other search and rescue team members will give them "on behalf of the class."
sentences.chinese: 美聯社報道，其他搜救隊員將爲他們“代班”。

sentences.english: Invitation of the Government of Mexico, Chile, support search and rescue experts to the scene.
sentences.chinese: 應墨西哥政府邀請，智利專家趕赴現場支援搜救。

sentences.english: Residents attend the scene of a train crash in Camaguey, Cuba, Feb. 7, 2009.
sentences.chinese: 2月7日，古巴卡馬圭省居民在出事列車現場搜救。

sentences.english: But Wampler said the search effort would continue for the time being.
sentences.chinese: 但是萬普勒說搜救的努力將會隨時間繼續下去。

sentences.english: The picture shows the rescue workers at the Bristol Ganga river search and rescue work.
sentences.chinese: 圖爲救援人員在布里甘加河展開搜救工作。

sentences.english: Members of search-and-rescue teams will first try to prevent additional heat loss.
sentences.chinese: 搜救隊成員將首先試圖防止低溫症患者流失更多熱量。

definition: to provide relief during times of emergency and disaster (idiom)
(of a plane, ship etc) to have an accident (plane crash, shipwreck, vehicle collision etc)/to mess things up
to get into difficulties/to meet with danger
to relieve disaster/to help disaster victims
to salvage/to dredge/to fish out (person or object from the sea)
